title: Years ago there were lots of signs that stated, KEEP RIGHT EXCEPT TO PASS, on highways that had two lanes in the same direction. I have noticed that most of those signs were done away with. Why? I think the major reason for ROAD RAGE and lots of accidents is the driver who thinks he has just as much right to drive in the left lane as he does to drive in the right lane.
